channel.title: applications on Petros Papapanagiotou
channel.description: Recent content in applications on Petros Papapanagiotou

item.title: Health Informatics
item.description: I help NHS and social care organisations develop and optimize care pathways and models of care, adopt new digital technologies, and manage data better, in order to deliver safer and more consistent care across patients.

item.title: Process & Data Innovation
item.description: I investigate cultural, ethical, and resource constraints in data-driven innovation and change management in large and public organisations, including issues of privacy, responsibility, and data governance.
